doc.title: La serenata
doc.plot: Set in 18th-century France. While Count de Flavimont has been called to a military camp his wife Marthe is having an affair. An anonymous friend informs him, and he returns to Paris to defend his honor. At 'the serenade', settled for the evening of his return, husband and lover fight and eventually they both fall down a balcony. When Marthe goes down to look for them she finds her lover dead.
